H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H5401.def: = action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye

H5390.def: = the touch of the lips or the lips and cheeks between two people ► usually as a sign of love and desire, but also to greet or show respect

H1730.def: = person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H7381.def: = a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H4900.def: = state in which humans are of more than average height{N:001}

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H7323.def: = action by which humans walk at a relatively high speed

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H2315.def: = area enclosed by walls or partitions, floor, and ceiling; ◄ part of building

H1523.def: mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H8055.def: = state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

H1730.def: = person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H4339.def: = state in which an object has a relativedly flat surface, where people and objects can move without obstacles; ≈ associated with security and prosperity

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H5000.def: = state in which humans or parts of their body are considered physically attractive

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H6938.def: = man; ◄ second son of {L:Ishmael<SDBH:יִשְׁמָעֵאל>}; ► founder of ethnic group

H3407.def: = long strip ◄ of cloth, usually made out of goat's hair or linen, ► sewn together to form larger pieces of cloth used as covering for a tent or for separating one room from another

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H8121.def: = celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

H7805.def: = process by which humans and animals focus their eyes on an object

H517.def: = direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

H2734.def: = process by which humans gradually disappear from the face of the earth ◄ as if burnt away by fire

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H5201.def: = causative action by which humans make sure that an object is safe from harm; ◄ by observing the object and the surrounding area carefully and intervening when necessary

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3754.def: = field where {L:grapes<SDBH:עֲנָב>} are cultivated, growing on {L:vines<SDBH:גֶּפֶן>}; typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a {L:watchtower<SDBH:מִגְדָּל>} and a {L:wine press<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}

28.gl: to place (in a position) > to appoint

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H7257.def: = action by which humans or animals assume a horizontal position, either to rest or to attack

H4100.def: = a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

H5844.def: = causative action by which someone puts an object on top of or in front of something else

H5739.def: = a large group of domesticated mammals that moves and stays together, either in an enclosure or in a open area ◄ usually sheep or goats, but can also include camels or cattle

H2270.def: = person that belongs to a group or class of people

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H3303.def: = state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H6119.def: = the back part of the foot of humans and animals below the ankle

H6629.def: = group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd

H7462.def: = action by which animals are feeding on grass and other edible materials in the field, ≈ often extended to denote the way a king cares for his subjects or the way God cares for his people

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4908.def: = location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside

H1819.def: = process by which part of the body is reduced to inactivity

H7474.def: = female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person

H7393.def: = upper stone of two stones ► that are used to grind grain into flour; the grain was placed on the stationary bottom stone, and the top stone was pressed down on top of the grain and scraped back and forth

H3895.def: = the lower bony structure of the skull of humans and certain animals that forms the framework of the mouth and holds the teeth

H4998.def: = state in which humans or parts of their body are considered physically attractive

H8447.def: = a bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives  in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

H2737.def: = string of objects; ◄ made of precious stones or shells; ► usually worn around the neck; used for personal adornment

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H8447.def: = a bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives  in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H5351.def: exact meaning unsure; possibly: = a small, rounded piece of glass,  metal, or precious stone used for decorating the human body

H3701.def: = silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H5373.def: = a leafy bush, less than a meter high, with fragrant-smelling, short stems and a tuft of three narrow leaflets at the tip of each stem; its pink flowers are umbrella-shaped; ► its tubers are pounded to extract a pungent, pale orange or yellow oil; ≈ associated with fragrance

H7381.def: = a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it

H1730.def: = person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

H6872.def: = small container ◄ made of cloth; ► used to transport money, pack aromatic spices in order to put it between clothes, etc .; ≈ associated with possessions and treasures

H4753.def: = the gum of a bush or shrub with thick thorny branches that project and bend at odd angles; its leaves come in sets of three; its fruit is oval like a plum; its wood and bark have a pleasant smell; the gum oozes naturally from the branches; clear or yellowish brown when it comes out, but gets darker as it dries; ◄ Commiphora myrrha, abyssinica, or schimperi; ► an ingredient of anointing oil and perfume; ≈ regarded as precious

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H1730.def: = person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

H811.def: = group of flowers or fruits positioned on one stem

H3754.def: = field where {L:grapes<SDBH:עֲנָב>} are cultivated, growing on {L:vines<SDBH:גֶּפֶן>}; typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a {L:watchtower<SDBH:מִגְדָּל>} and a {L:wine press<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}

H5872.def: = oasis, also known as {L:Hazezon-Tamar<SDBH:חַצְצֹן תָּמָר>}; ◄ located in the {L:wilderness<SDBH:מִדְבָּר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; on western shore of {L:Dead Sea<SDBH:יָם־הַמֶּלַח>}

H3303.def: = state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye

H7474.def: = female person who has a special and intimate relationship with another person

H3123.def: = a bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives  in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

H3303.def: = state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye

H1730.def: = person for whom one has great affection, often accompanied by sexual desire

H637.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H5273.def: = state in which a person or object has qualities that inspire love and appreciation

H6210.def: = a low platform standing on four legs, a bit longer than the length of a man, and about 70-80 centimeters wide

H6982.def: = length of cut timber ◄ cut from a tree; ► used for the construction of a building

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H730.def: = evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength

H7351.def: = length of wood ► supporting the roof of a building

H1266.def: exact meaning unsure: = one of the evergreen trees commonly found in the Lebanon, with round leaves rather than flat; its fruit is a a mostly inedible seed-bearing, fleshy cone; ≈ regarded as one of the glorious trees of the Lebanon
